title: kandA sharaNamenru
sahitya:
kandA sharaNam enru vandEn undaniDam indA enraruLai tandiDuvAi enru


anupallavi

  cendUr vandunnai sEvittiDum anbar enda nALumE inbam eidiDa sheivOnE


caraNam    inda bhuvi tannil enda vidamum ini nondiDAmal aDiyEn santOSam aDaiyavum 
bandha vinaigaL anaittum parandODi maraindiDavum cintai unadil aruL surandiDavE paNindu
